isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - PAINT AND REFINISHING - SAFETY

warning.para: Hazardous material can cause injury or death to a painter, as well as cause damage to property and pollute the soil, water, and air.

svcproc.title: PERSONAL PROTECTION
svcproc.para: When handling hazardous materials you need to know:

step1.para: What the material is or what makes it hazardous.
The hazardous properties of the material.
The correct personal protection equipment needed for working with that material.
How to properly use the protection equipment.
How to determine the protection equipment is functioning properly.

svcproc.para: Be sure to read the manufacturer's warning labels and instruction sheets. Ask for the Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS) for further detailed hazard handling instructions.
